variable.name: sr
variable.description: Current stocking rate on farm (i.e. excludes cows wintering off)

variable.name: PWO
variable.description: Percentage of stocking wintering off farm

variable.name: Cow_dLWt
variable.description: Average change in per cow Live weight

variable.name: Cow_IsDry
variable.description: Is the herd currently dried off

variable.name: SilageCut
variable.description: Amount of silage made on farm

varible.name: ME_Demand
varible.description: Metabolisable energy demand [MJME/ha]

varible.name: ME_Eaten
varible.description: Metabolisable energy eaten [MJME/ha]

varible.name: ME_Eaten_Pasture
varible.description: Metabolisable energy from pasture eaten [MJME/ha]

varible.name: ME_Eaten_Supplement
varible.description: Metabolisable energy from supplements eaten [MJME/ha]

varible.name: DM_Eaten
varible.description: Dry matter eaten on a [kgDM/ha]

varible.name: DM_Eaten_Pasture
varible.description: Dry matter eaten from pasture eaten [kgDM/ha]

varible.name: DM_Eaten_Supplement
varible.description: Dry matter easten from supplements eaten [kgDM/ha]

varible.name: N_Eaten
varible.description: N consumed [kgN/ha]

varible.name: N_Eaten_Pasture
varible.description: N consumed from pasture eaten [kgN/ha]

varible.name: N_Eaten_Supplement
varible.description: N consumed from supplements [kgN/ha]

varible.name: N_to_milk
varible.description: Amount of consumed N that was diverted to milk production [kgN/ha]

varible.name: N_to_BC
varible.description: Amount of consumed N that was diverted to change in body condition [kgN/ha] (-ve indicated release of N from reserves)

varible.name: N_to_feaces
varible.description: Amount of consumed N that was excreted as feaces [kgN/ha]

varible.name: N_to_urine
varible.description: Amount of consumed N that was excreted as urine [kgN/ha]

varible.name: PaddockStatus
varible.description: 1=growing; 2=was grazed today; 3=was partially greazed today; 4=closed for conservation; 5=was harvested today

varible.name: ME_Eaten_Pdks
varible.description: Metabolisable energy eaten on a /ha basis by paddock

varible.description: N consumed from pasture eaten on a /ha basis by paddock

varible.description: N consumed from supplements on a /ha basis by paddock

varible.name: N_to_BC_Pdks
varible.description: Amount of consumed N that was diverted to change in body condition on a /ha basis (-ve indicated release of N from reserves) by paddock

varible.description: Amount of consumed N returned to the paddock as feaces
